MemoryInfobox.name: A Kind of Treasure Hunt
MemoryInfobox.description: 'While not exactly what was promised, Barnabas and Herodotus had put their hearts into making Kassandra a treasure hunt that she was eager to complete.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories'

General_Description: '''A Kind of Treasure Hunt''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories]]''
